name: onor
desc: We understand the importance of your company's site to its image and virtue is honorable to us to serve you.

name: ntegrity
desc: The wholeness of the design needs to convey your company's values.

name: eturn
desc: Revenue works on both ends- serving clients well while saving $$$ is core to your business. Meeting your expectations is our Aim.

name: volution
desc: We understand that a site's functionality, look and touch reflects your company's values. We dynamically develop with forward thinking to incorporate scalability.

name: nity
desc: Understanding who your are, requires understanding unity. This allows us to design with uniqueness to meet your needs and branding.

name: teadfast
desc: We are loyal and devoted to your needs, with military backing - much through hardwork and perserverance. With loyalty and persistance, we will become friends. We are in this for the long haul.
